attributes.action: Acknowledge a no confidence vote from uk voters
attributes.additional_details: As the tax payers we want our voices heard not just what the party elected thinks the voters want! Putting a no confidence box on the ballot would ensure politicians engage with the voters opinions
attributes.background: Uk voters are forced to vote a party leader even when the option is that of a bad bunch rather than the option to say the voters don’t agree with the majority of the parties manifesto

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Implement "None of the above" on ballots in all United Kingdom elections #NOTAUK
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/650023
